xdi2.core
Interface GraphFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGraphFactory, AbstractKeyValueGraphFactory, BDBGraphFactory, MapGraphFactory, MemoryGraphFactory, PropertiesGraphFactory
public interface GraphFactory

A graph factory can construct new XDI graph implementations.

Author:
markus
